#summary How to use this software

= Introduction =

Here you will learn what do you have to do in order to simply use this software


= Details =

* Download mailServer.zip (http://zir-mail-server.googlecode.com/files/mailServer.zip)

* Uncompress the zip file

* Edit conf/server.properties to match your needs

* Launch it with "java -jar bin/mailServer.jar" or install it as a service (windows enviroment)

= Installing as a service =

* Edit bin/jsl.ini wrkdir and cmdline props under the "java" section to match your installation dir

* Run bin/jsl.exe -install
